name: Madhu Salumuri
company_address: B-101 Landmark Residency, Madinaguda, Madinaguda, Hyderabad, Telangana, 500049
my_business: Praroha Greens, is a health-focused urban farming venture that grows nutrient-rich, pesticide-free microgreens using sustainable, indoor, soil-based methods.
top_product: Flagship varieties include: • Sunflower Microgreens – rich in protein and vitamin E • Wheatgrass – a detox superfood loaded with chlorophyll • Broccoli Microgreens – high in sulforaphane, known for cancer-fighting properties • Radish Microgreens – spicy, crunchy, and immunity-boosting • Pea Shoots – sweet, tender, and rich in folate and fiber • Beetroot Microgreens – vibrant red leaves packed with iron, potassium, and antioxidants that support heart health and blood purification Why It’s the Top Product: • Naturally grown, no chemicals • Delivered fresh and locally • High nutrient density in a small volume • Appeals to a wide demographic (health-conscious adults, wellness experts, chefs, etc.) • Used in smoothies, salads, soups, and garnishes Also popular: • Subscription Packs – weekly deliveries of assorted microgreens • Workshop for Kids/Schools – educational + hands-on learning
ideal_referral: These are individuals or groups likely to purchase and benefit from microgreens: 1. Health-conscious individuals – fitness enthusiasts, diabetics, or people recovering from illness. 2. Young parents – looking for nutritious options for their children. 3. Working professionals – seeking quick, healthy meal add-ons. 4. Elderly individuals – needing easy-to-digest, nutrient-dense food. 5. Vegans/Vegetarians – who appreciate plant-based superfoods. Ideal Institutional Referrals These are potential bulk buyers or strategic collaborators: 1. Nutritionists and Dietitians – to recommend microgreens to clients. 2. Wellness coaches and yoga studios – promoting health and holistic living. 3. Restaurants and cafes – especially those that focus on organic, farm-to-table, or healthy meals. 4. Schools and daycare centers – incorporating nutrition education. 5. Gyms and health clubs – adding value to fitness programs. Ideal Business/Franchise Referrals These people might want to partner, invest, or start a franchise: 1. Aspiring entrepreneurs in health/wellness/agriculture 2. Organic store owners 3. Home-based business seekers (urban women, retirees, etc.) 4. Young farmers interested in vertical farming/hydroponics 5. NRI investors looking for sustainable businesses in India
top_problem_solved: Lack of Access to Fresh, Affordable, and Nutrient-Dense Foods in Urban Lifestyles How Praroha Greens Solves This: 1. Provides Nutrient-Rich Microgreens o Delivers up to 40x more nutrients than mature vegetables in small, daily portions. o Fills the nutrition gap in fast-paced, urban diets. 2. Makes Healthy Eating Convenient and Affordable o Offers ready-to-eat packs, subscriptions, and grow kits that are easy to use and budget-friendly. 3. Supports Preventive Health o Targets lifestyle-related health issues like diabetes, obesity, and fatigue by offering natural, plant-based nutrition. 4. Promotes Sustainable and Local Farming o Uses eco-friendly, soil-less techniques with minimal water and space—ideal for urban environments. 5. Raises Awareness and Educates Communities o Conducts workshops, kids’ camps, and school programs to build awareness about nutrition and sustainable living In Short: Praroha Greens solves the modern dilemma of eating right in a fast-moving world—by growing wellness at your doorstep.
my_favourite_bni_story: During one of my early BNI meetings, I gave a 30-second pitch on how microgreens can reverse nutritional gaps in urban diets. I mentioned that Praroha Greens focuses not only on growing microgreens but on growing a healthier lifestyle. Right after the meeting, all fellow membesr approached me and said, "we would like to have Microgreens!" Within a week, I was delivering weekly microgreens subscription packs to them. This has led to over 40+ repeat customers and a long-term relationship. What started as a 30-second pitch turned into a life-changing nutritional solution for many. This story isn’t just about a sale—it’s about how the BNI spirit of "Givers Gain" helped bring health into homes and smiles into lives.

my_business:
Foreign Exchange Support Services
USD / Euro / GBP / AUD / CNY / JPY / MYR / VND / and all other major and minor currencies - Assist in Buying and Selling at a Best price possible
top_product: Prepaid Forex Cards for travel Foreign currency notes for personal/business travel Remittances for: University/College fee payments Living and accommodation expenses Tour and cinema-related expenses abroad Medical professionals attending conferences overseas
ideal_referral: Parents of students going abroad for studies Travel agents, tour operators, and travel bloggers Doctors attending overseas seminars or CMEs Film industry professionals paying for foreign production services Business owners/employees travelling internationally Connect me with educational consultants, visa agents, and immigration advisors
top_problem_solved: 1. “Where can I get safe and hassle-free prepaid Forex cards for travel abroad?” I provide RBI-compliant, reloadable prepaid Forex cards for tourists, students, and business travelers — with better rates and personalized service. 2. “How do I send money abroad for my child’s university tuition and living expenses?” I help parents of international students complete university fee payments and maintenance transfers smoothly, with full documentation support. 3. “I need foreign currency for an upcoming international trip — where do I go?” I deliver genuine foreign currency (USD, EUR, GBP, AUD, etc.) quickly and reliably, ensuring compliance and best rates. 4. “I’m a doctor attending a medical conference overseas — how do I pay the registration fee?” I assist medical professionals with international payments for conference fees, including document guidance and Forex remittance. 5. “My travel company needs to pay a foreign tour operator for bookings — what’s the best way?” I support travel companies and tour agents with quick, compliant foreign remittances for tour packages, hotels, and travel bookings. 6. “I’m in the film industry and need to pay for international production services — is this possible?” Yes, I assist cinema and media professionals in paying international vendors or event organizers legally and efficiently.
my_favourite_bni_story: On March 19, 2025, I visited a BNI chapter for the first time as a guest. That morning gave me my first glimpse into the power of structured, trust-based referral networking — and I instantly sensed the growth potential it offered for every business owner. During the meeting, I connected with Mrs. Srivani Nerella from Ms. Kriven Concepts, who happened to mention her upcoming business trip to China. Recognizing an opportunity, I politely asked if I could assist with her Forex requirements. Without hesitation, she agreed. It was a pleasure to serve her with timely, compliant, and personalized Forex support for her travel. That interaction not only gave me my first referral experience in BNI — but also reinforced my belief that BNI is about building trust one conversation at a time. That one meeting turned into a long-term relationship — and since then, I’ve continued to serve more travelers through the BNI network.

While there isn’t a specific viral or widely published BNI "success story" linked to V Zone Photography itself, insights from trusted wedding and business platforms, as well as recurring themes in BNI networking, suggest several types of favorite BNI stories likely to feature V Zone: Transforming Referrals into Lifelong Clients: Through BNI, V Zone Photography has repeatedly benefited from intentional, high-quality referrals by fellow members—often wedding planners, event organizers, or other vendors with complementary services.
